lom:description.lom:string:
Best practices from the NSF ADVANCE Program to increase the representation and advancement of women in academic science and engineering careers.
In order to measure change before and after a program has been initiated, assessment must be considered and data collected. Various types of surveys and measures of change are listed below in the following categories. * Assessment Plan
* Climate Survey * Faculty Survey
* NSF Required Data Indicators
* Recommendations And Best Practices
* Statistics
* Status of Women Reports.
